channel.title: ImageMagick on Christian Saal
channel.description: Recent content in ImageMagick on Christian Saal

item.title: Image to Sketch
item.description: Intro Sometimes it is just nice to create a sketch from an image. There is from my opinion no other reason then fun on aesthetics. Tool There are plenty tools to solve such a task. Apps, browser based version or well known software tool like Gimp or Photoshop. Here i used ImageMagick a really powerfull image editing tool. Code At first we will need a picture. Every stands and falls with the picture.
